title: Fix: Spike artifacts on cube corners
description: Miter joins on strokes create pointy extensions. Need to use round or bevel line joins.

title: Feature: Tileset support for maze elements
description: Replace programmatic cube drawing with tileset-based rendering. Support custom tile images for: wall, pathway, door, start, end. Need: 1) Tile loading system, 2) Configuration for tile type mapping, 3) Image-based rendering in draw function.

title: Feature: Asset picker with previews for tilesets
description: Replace URL-only inputs with a picker showing local assets from src/assets with image previews

title: Fix: Bottom of maze still slightly cut off
description: Additional margin needed for cube depth at high display scales

title: Feature: Directional wall textures and stroke toggle
description: Support separate left/right wall face textures, default floor, solid white top, and stroke on/off toggle

title: Feature: Adjustable display size/scale
description: Currently wallSize controls the tile dimensions. Add ability to scale the entire maze output independently from the maze grid resolution. Could add a displayScale parameter or separate output dimensions.

title: Feature: Optional SVG export
description: Add ability to export maze as SVG in addition to PNG. Options: 1) Manual SVG path generation mirroring current canvas drawing, 2) Use a canvas-to-SVG library. Add UI toggle for export format selection.

title: Fix strokeWallCorners rendering issues
description:
## Issue
Multiple stroke rendering issues with strokeWallCorners option:

1. **Lost green lines at T-junction inner corners**: Right corner not drawing at inner corners where rightPixel=1 but should draw
2. **Thin magenta lines inside walls**: Center corner appears thin inside wall sections
3. **Thick green lines inside walls**: Right corner drawing in wrong places

## Fix Applied (iteration 2)

### Changes made:
1. Added `topRightPixel` diagonal neighbor detection in draw loop
2. Passed `topRightPixel` to both `createTexturedCube` and `createBorderCube`
3. Updated function signatures to accept `topRightPixel` parameter

### New stroke corner conditions:

**Center corner (magenta):**
```javascript
if (!bottomPixel && !rightPixel)
```
Only draws when fully exposed at front - no adjacent cube will cover the stroke.

**Right corner (green):**
```javascript
const rightExposed = !rightPixel;
const tJunctionInnerCorner = rightPixel && !topPixel && topRightPixel;
if (rightExposed || tJunctionInnerCorner)
```
Draws when right face is exposed OR at T-junction inner corners (wall to right, no wall above, but wall at diagonal top-right).

**Left corner (blue):**
```javascript
if (!leftPixel)
```
Unchanged - draws when left face is exposed.

## Debug Colors
Red=top edge, Orange=right top, Yellow=bottom front, Lime=left top
Cyan=bottom, Blue=left corner, Magenta=center corner, Green=right corner

title: Feature: Path width/height scaling
description: Add pathWidth and pathHeight settings to scale corridor cells while keeping walls thin. Transform matrix after generation.

title: Fix: Bottom of isometric maze is cut off
description: The canvas height calculation doesn't account for the 3D cube height that extends below the isometric projection. The createBorderCube function draws cubes with faces that extend downward by 'height' parameter (defaults to tileHeight), but canvas.height only accounts for the flat isometric projection.
